Bassil protects 'Aounism' and prepares for 'coup'
04 Nov 2019, 05:57 by Lebanon 24
Under the headline "Bassel protects" Aounism "... and prepares for" coup ", Claire Shukr wrote in the newspaper" Nidaa El Watan "and said: very briefly, the speech of the President of the" Free Patriotic Movement "Gibran Bassil to the demonstrators in support of President Michel Aoun , At the level of the deep crisis that hits the country. He seemed to be separated from the earth. It is a lot of arrogance and denial of reality. Basil wanted to take advantage of the "Aouni" situation, which was re-highlighted to the forefront at the expense of the "basilic" at its periphery, in order to exploit the public sympathy with the "general of the palace" to polish the image of the head of the current after the systematic destruction. Thus, Bassil did not hesitate to climb the wave of Awni movement that is identical with the President of the Republic, in order to restore his position and person after his moral "overthrow" on the street, amidst the harsh war he is facing by the "Presidential Settlement Partner", Prime Minister Saad Hariri.
